column5: GOING TO THE WHIRLPOOL TOMORROW AND WAS WONDERING HOW THE CONDITIONS WERE  I CAN USE A  REFRESHER  COURSE ON SET UP  I have the pikers but cant remember how far to set up the slip float.   I kinda remember 13-17ft leads under the float  but please correct meif I am wrong..  any help is appreciated  Dave
I just got back from Niagara, the waters look excellent - nice and clear. Wasn't there to fish tho  Maybe another time I might actually go fishing in Niagara...
I know the way to the whirlpool...bit of a hike down but in the warmer weather it is hit after hit! Maybe swing by Hamilton and go from here fishing!
Hey Dave   ..........So how did you do down there today?  Counted 12 cars in parking lot by 5:45 am and the Glen was no better.  cheers Streamerguy
